summary: An ordinance accepting a permit from the Northern Pacific Railway Company to construct, operate and maintain upon its right of way and under the main track of its Sumas Line, at the intersection of Railroad Avenue Northeast with 30th Avenue Northeast, a forty-two inch (42") sewer pipe line, known as the "Laurelhurst Trunk Sewer" and an appurtenant two inch (2") galvanized iron water supply pipe line; and authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to sign the same.
